#labels Phase-Implementation,Featured
This page outlines what versions of Hbase-Writer are compatible with which versions of Heritrix, Hbase, Zookeeper and Hadoop.

= Version List =

Check the version list below for compatibility.

Hbase Writer

* hbase-writer 0.9
    compatible with: Heritrix 2.x/3.X, Hadoop 0.20.X, HBase 0.20.X, Zookeeper 3.2.X

* hbase-writer 0.20.3
    compatible with: Heritrix 2.x, Hadoop 0.20.X, HBase 0.20.X, Zookeeper 3.2.X

* hbase-writer 0.19.X
    compatible with: Heritrix 2.x, Hadoop 0.19.X, HBase 0.19.X

* hbase-writer 0.18.X
    compatible with: Heritrix 2.x, Hadoop 0.18.X, HBase 0.18.X
